Author: windowsofthislove
Text: This might be hard to hear, but you’ll never hit your peak potential starving. You’ll crash and burn eventually & you deserve so much more than that. The best actors I know treat their bodies not only as an instrument, but as well-taken care of vessel. A vessel that requires adequate sleep/rest, nourishment, and stress management. You’re clearly not taking care of your stress currently because your choices are not only taxing on your own physical presence, it’s leaking into the relationships you have with those around you too. Nobody likes a self-centered actor & that’s 1000% not how to get to the top. Nobody wants to help a self-centered actor, at least long-term. Get help now before things spiral even further.
